item.title: CLI Flags Explained
item.description: oclif makes it easy to create a command line interface (CLI) in node. Most commands have parameters — also known as "flags", "args", and sometimes "options". This blog post explains what these parameters are and when to ...

item.title: Introducing oclif
item.description: Coding for the browser takes serious time. You need to deal with front-end JS, CSS, design, product, and a ton more. On the other hand, building for a CLI takes a fraction of the effort. This makes CLIs particularly great for prototyping out new fun...
